text: Bedu'inabilake kaya, ‘ami imana anilo’. Koraa, ‘tomaloke imana ana na'i, baram tomaloke koraa, ‘ami atmasamarpana karailo’, karana imana etiya'o tomalokara antarata praraesa karaa na'i. Yadi tomaloke allaha arau te'omra raachulara anugatya karaa tente te'om tomalokara amalasamuhara choraaba akano laghara nakaraiba. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu’
